author: Staff Reporter
text:
In a bid to raise awareness of the importance of voting in the Assembly elections on May 16, students from Government Engineering College and VOC College of Education here took out a rally on Friday.

The rally, which commenced near the engineering college at Bryant Nagar, was taken through Chidambara Nagar and returned to the college. The students raised slogans, appealing to the eligible voters to exercise their franchise to ensure 100 per cent polling.

As many as 480 students participated in the rally.
title: College students take out rally
